subject: Meeting request
body: Hi Arshwin — are you free Friday 3–4pm for a haircut? If not, next week Tue afternoon works. — Priya

subject: Invoice #1234 - due Nov 30
body: Dear Arshwin, your invoice #1234 for $150 is due on Nov 30. Please confirm payment.

subject: Weekly team update
body: Team — here are the updates for this week: we finished feature X, started Y, and plan Z next week.

subject: Quick follow-up
body: Can you send the draft by Monday? Thanks.

subject: Schedule a call
body: Hi, can we schedule a quick call next Wednesday morning to discuss the PR? Best, Raj.

subject: Request for quote
body: Hello Arshwin, please send a quote for 100 units of product A by Dec 5. Regards, Supplier.
